Name: RoundhousE Database Migrations
Description:
Database migrations using [RoundhousE](https://github.com/chucknorris/roundhouse).
With this template you can either include RoundhousE with your package or use the `Download RoundhousE?` feature to download it at deploy time.  If you're downloading, you can choose the version by specifying it in the `Version of RoundhousE`.

NOTE: 
 - AWS EC2 IAM Role authentication requires the AWS CLI be installed.
 - To run on Linux, the machine must have both PowerShell Core and .NET Core 3.1 installed.

Note - The RoundhousE GitHub Project has been abandoned and as a result this template is now deprecated.  Version 9 will be the last release of this template.
Author: twerthi

Parameters.Name: roundhousePackage
Parameters.Label: RoundhousEPackage
Parameters.HelpText: The package containing the scripts for RoundhousE to deploy.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseServerName
Parameters.Label: Database Server Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name or IP address of the server being deployed to.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseServerPort
Parameters.Label: Database Server Port
Parameters.HelpText: Port number for the database server.  Uses default server port if left blank.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseAuthenticationMethod
Parameters.Label: Authentication Method
Parameters.HelpText: Method used to authenticate to the database server.

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
awsiam|AWS EC2 IAM Role
usernamepassword|Username\Password
windowsauthentication|Windows Authentication

Parameters.Name: roundhouseDatabaseName
Parameters.Label: Database Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the database to deploy to.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseSsl
Parameters.Label: Force SSL
Parameters.HelpText: Check this box for force connection string to use SSL.  Only applicable to MariaDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL database types.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseVersion
Parameters.Label: Database Version
Parameters.HelpText: Version number of your database migration.  Default value is the version of the RoundhousE package.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseUsername
Parameters.Label: Database Username
Parameters.HelpText: Username of the account with sufficient permissions to execute scripts.  (Leave blank for Integrated Authentication.)

Parameters.Name: roundhouseUserPassword
Parameters.Label: Database User Password
Parameters.HelpText: Password for the Database Username account.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseDatabaseServerType
Parameters.Label: Database Server Type
Parameters.HelpText: The database technology being deployed to.

DisplaySettings.Octopus.SelectOptions:
mariadb|MariaDB
mysql|MySQL
oracle|Oracle
postgres|PostgreSQL
sqlserver|SQL Server

Parameters.Name: roundhouseWithTransaction
Parameters.Label: Use Transaction?
Parameters.HelpText: Check this box if you want all scripts to be run within the same transaction.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseDryRun
Parameters.Label: Dry Run?
Parameters.HelpText: Check this box if you want to perform a dry run.  Results are recorded and attached as deployment artifacts if you check Record Output.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseRecordOutput
Parameters.Label: Record Output?
Parameters.HelpText: Check this box to record the output of the run.  Useful for gathering what would be changed for approval purposes.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseUpFolder
Parameters.Label: Up Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: Relative location of the Up folder.  If left blank, .\up is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseAlterDatabaseFolder
Parameters.Label: AlterDatabase Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: AlterDatabase folder path.  If left blank, .\alterDatabase is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseRunBeforeUpFolder
Parameters.Label: RunBeforeUp Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: RunBeforeUp folder path.  If left blank, .\runbeforeUp is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseFunctionsFolder
Parameters.Label: Functions Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: Filepath for user defined functions.  If left blank, .\functions is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseViewsFolder
Parameters.Label: Views Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: Filepath for view scripts.  If left blank, .\views is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseSprocsFolder
Parameters.Label: Sprocs Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: File path for stored procedures.  If left blank, .\sprocs is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseTriggerFolder
Parameters.Label: Trigger folder path
Parameters.HelpText: File path for database triggers.  If left blank .\triggers is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseIndexFolder
Parameters.Label: Index Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: File path for Index scripts.  If left blank, .\indexes is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseRunAfterAnyTimeFolder
Parameters.Label: RunAfterAnytime Folder Path
Parameters.HelpText: File path for running scripts after the Other Anytime scripts.  If left blank, .\runAfterOtherAnyTimeScripts is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhousePermissionsFolder
Parameters.Label: Permissions Folder path
Parameters.HelpText: Folder path that holds permission scripts.  If left blank, .\permissions is used.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseDownloadNuget
Parameters.Label: Download RoundhousE?
Parameters.HelpText: Check this box if you want the template to download RoundhousE and use the downloaded version for deployment.  Requires .NET Core be installed on the machine executing the deployment.

Parameters.Name: roundhouseNugetVersion
Parameters.Label: Version of RoundhousE
Parameters.HelpText: Version of RoundhousE to download (used with Download RoundhousE option), leave blank for latest.
